name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Lead Sitecore Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I specialize in **Sitecore**, **C#**, and **.NET 8**, driving high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My technological expertise includes **Azure Web Apps**, **Azure Functions**, **Azure SQL Databases**, and **Azure DevOps**, accompanied by hands-on skills in **PowerShell** and **Kubernetes**. I am proficient in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Vue3**, and **React**, allowing me to develop seamless full-stack applications.

I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that seamlessly integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My deep cloud experience enhances application reliability and scalability, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Additionally, I have a robust foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, which I leverage to build secure applications. My background also includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
